text: aur wo waqt yaad karna chaahiye ke aap ke rab ne ye baath batlaadi ke wo un yahood par qayaamath tak aise shaqs ko zaroor musallath karta rahega jo un ko sazaaye shadeed ki takleef pahonchaata rahega, bila shuba aap ka rab jaldi hee saza deta hai aur bila shuba wo waqeyi badi maghfirath aur badi rehmath waala hai
